description: Catalog of open datasets and recommended access/notes for Vietnam & SE Asia fishing analytics.

datasets.name: Global Fishing Watch - Fishing Effort
datasets.license: See Global Fishing Watch Terms of Use (registration required). Public research access available; attribution required.
datasets.spatial_format: BigQuery public datasets, processed raster/tiles, CSV subsets, APIs
datasets.last_updated: varies (GFW maintains rolling updates; check the data page)
datasets.notes: High-quality AIS-derived fishing effort and vessel tracks. Requires free registration for most downloads; ideal for effort heatmaps and time series. Large volume; use pre-aggregated tiles or BigQuery for scalable queries.

datasets.name: FAO Fisheries and Aquaculture Statistics (FishStat/Aquastat)
datasets.license: FAO data: follow FAO citation and terms on the FAO website (dataset-specific).
datasets.spatial_format: Tabular CSV/Excel summaries; not always spatially explicit (province-level available in some tables)
datasets.notes: Authoritative catch and aquaculture production statistics by country and commodity. Often aggregated (by country/province/year) — good for dashboards but not vessel-level mapping. Requires normalization to match spatial provinces.

datasets.name: Vietnam Open Data Portal (data.gov.vn)
datasets.license: Varies by dataset (government datasets often public domain or permissive); check dataset metadata before use.
datasets.spatial_format: CSV, Shapefile, GeoJSON; API endpoints may exist
datasets.notes: Search for fisheries, aquaculture, and coastal resource datasets. Good source of official statistics and boundary shapefiles for provinces.

datasets.name: Open Development Mekong / Open Development Vietnam
datasets.license: Open Development Mekong content: CC BY-SA 4.0 (site notes)
datasets.last_updated: varies; site actively maintained (2024-2025 activity noted)
datasets.notes: Good curated local/regional datasets (coastline, mangroves, aquaculture sites, project footprints). Verify original source links and licenses.

datasets.name: Global Mangrove Watch (CGIAR/UNEP)
datasets.license: See site; data is publicly downloadable (check the terms on GMW).
datasets.notes: High-value coastal habitat layer (mangroves) — important for aquaculture and fisheries vulnerability overlays.

datasets.name: ProtectedPlanet / WDPA - Marine Protected Areas
datasets.license: WDPA data access & terms; some downloads require registration. Check data use restrictions.
datasets.notes: Official MPA polygons — use to mask or highlight no-take zones and regulatory boundaries.

datasets.name: UNEP-WCMC / Ocean+ Habitats
datasets.license: See UNEP-WCMC site; citation required. Data available for download.
datasets.geographic_coverage: Global; includes coral reefs, seagrasses, mangroves
datasets.notes: Provides habitat layers (coral, seagrass) useful for habitat–fisheries overlays and sensitivity analysis.
